# File Transporter

Sends data to a file.

# Examples

"transporters" : {
	"file" : {
		"type" : "file",
		"config" : {
			"path" : "/var/logout${path}",
			"format" : "${originalMessage}"
		}
	}
}

# Configuration parameters

  • path : File path (supports expression)
  • format : Output expression of the message being sent
